meanings.definition: An instance of two or more objects striking together.
meanings.sent1: The collision between the two cars caused a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The collision of the billiard balls on the table was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The collision of opinions in the meeting led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent4: The collision of the waves against the shore created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The collision of the puzzle pieces finally revealed the complete picture.

meanings.definition: A conflict or opposition between ideas, interests, or people.
meanings.sent1: The collision of opinions in the group project caused delays.
meanings.sent2: The collision between the two political parties escalated quickly.
meanings.sent3: The collision of schedules made it challenging to find a suitable time.
meanings.sent4: The collision of personalities in the office led to tension.
meanings.sent5: The collision of interests between the siblings resulted in a compromise.
